snippet: A strong jobs report knocked down U.S. government bond prices, as major stock indexes wavered between slight gains and losses after an early slump.
abstract: Stocks close lower, despite strong jobs report.
lead_paragraph: A strong jobs report knocked down U.S. government bond prices, as major stock indexes wavered between slight gains and losses after an early slump.

headline.main: Wall St. Wavers After Unexpectedly Strong Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Improved Hiring Reports Lift the Dollar, but Not the Market
